name: Jamey Pelland
review: Highly recommend Mako construction. Was able to come give a quote right away and was able to get the job done the following week. Very happy with the work that was done.

name: Jason Parlby
review: I hired Mako Construction to remove an old concrete patio on my house and build a new treated wood patio the finished product was better then I could have asked for and they came in on budget and on time,I would definitely recommend them for and construction issues you may have.
